welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fair Oaks Ranch, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that our community has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Antonio International Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
